description: "Assembles SQLLab bootstrap data (active_tab, databases, queries, tab_state_ids) in a single endpoint. The data can be assembled from the current user's id."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the bootstrap data for SqlLab page"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/sqllab/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assembles SQLLab bootstrap data (active_tab, databases, queries, tab_state_ids) in a single endpoint. The data can be assembled from the current user's id.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
